item.description:
Northern Lights Studios hosts its continuing 2012 Weekly Drawing Class Wed. Eves from 7-9:30 PM
in a Private Art Studio in Somerville. Artist Cost: $15.
Open Drawing With Teaching by Freeman Barnes
Freeman has been teaching drawing for 30 years.
*** New Models every week, rotating Males/ Females.***
Poses start at 5 minutes & graduate to 20 minutes, with a Refreshment Break in the Middle.
***Artists of All Levels Welcomed.****
>> Artists bring their Choice of Medium / Paper & Weekly Fee: $15.
Freeman has been teaching Figure Drawing for 28 years, and hired many of Boston area Top Models.
* Studio Location: Winter Hill/ Somerville: 22 Marshall Street ( 1/2 block from Broadway)
** FREE Parking in the lot next to the Building***
>> MBTA Accessible by #89 Bus from Davis or Sullivan Squares: Stops at end of Marshall Street
** RSVP Needed*** to bostonartguy@aol.com &/ or > (617) 335- 3424
>> Freeman's Web- Site: www.artbyFreeman.com
Reply with: Name/ Contact Info/ Art experience/ Web-site or images.
I look forward to teaching and helping All Artists with developing skills of:
Perspective/ Volume/ Composition/ Shading/ Line & Color.
Models> Also Always seeking New Models!! : Please Send: Age/ Stats/ Experience/ Photo/ Rate
item.name: Wednesday Night Drawing Group in Somerville
